author: jtaylor
msg: Changes which allow this stylesheet to actually turb xdocs into PDF. Still a
lot to do here (some of the inlines and links don't work properly, need to
get titles and footers and project data and such in). The biggest problem
is that we are making heavy use of tables in many of the generated docs, and
transforming them into a form that FOP can handle is... challenging. If anyone
else wants to take a look at that DIG IN! It works now so at least we have a

author: kaz
msg: Ditching org.apache.commons.lang.Numbers from the toolbox in favor of
java.text.DecimalFormat because there are Maven users in Barcelona that
are getting NumberFormatExceptions!!  We can't have that now can we?
Thanks to Simon Moore <Simon_Moore@condisline.com> for reporting this
